wtsproc.config: The front axle was removed from the vehicle for access. The brake system was not opened to prevent the need to bleed the brake system.

step1.para: Install wheel chocks.
Disconnect battery cable including ECM ground.
Raise vehicle and support with jack stands.
Remove both front spoke wheel.
Disconnect drag link at spindle and secure drag link out of way.
Disconnect both front brake hydraulic hose support clamp at top of king pin.
Disconnect both front disc brake caliper and secure out of way.

note.para: Do not open hydraulic brake system.

step1.para: Place suitable jack under axle and secure axle to jack.
Remove all front spring U-bolts.
Remove front non-driven axle. Remove front axle from jack if needed for transmission removal.
Drain automatic transmission fluid into suitable container.
Remove front drive shaft and support second section.
Disconnect parking brake lever cable from transmission.
Disconnect transmission shift cable from transmission.
Disconnect transmission wiring as needed to remove transmission.
Disconnect oil cooler lines at transmission and cap ends.
Disconnect transmission oil dipstick tube from transmission. Reposition and secure for access.
Disconnect starter wiring from starter and secure out of way. Include remove wire harness support bracket.
Remove starter motor assembly.
Remove flywheel inspection plate.
Remove torque converter assembly bolts.
Remove bolts retaining transmission to engine EXCEPT TWO.
Install transmission jack to transmission and secure.
Remove automatic transmission assembly, include remove remaining bolts.
Install automatic transmission assembly.

note.para: Be sure to fully engage torque converter into pump.

step1.para: Install bolts retaining transmission to engine. Torque to spec.
Remove transmission jack from transmission.
Install torque converter assembly bolts.
Install flywheel inspection plate.
Install starter motor assembly.
Connect starter wiring includes installing support brackets.
Install transmission oil dipstick tube, include p-clips.
Connect transmission oil cooler lines.
Connect transmission wiring.
Connect transmission shift cable.
Connect parking brake lever cable.
Install front drive shaft. Torque to spec.
Install front non-driven axle.
Install all front spring U-bolt and tighten. To be torqued after removing jack.
Remove jack.
Torque all front spring U-bolt.
Connect front disc brake caliper to anchor plate on both sides.
Connect front brake hydraulic hose support clamp to top of king pin cap on both sides.
Connect drag link to spindle. Torque to spec. and replace cottor pin.
Install both front spoke wheels. Torque to spec. and in proper sequence.
Remove jack stands.
Fill automatic transmission with proper fluid
Connect battery cable
Start engine and check for leaks. Adjust fluid level as needed.
Remove wheel chocks.
